name: better-armor-progression
title: More Meaningful Armor Progression
author: Sarge945, based on code from Cyres and palmic
description: Crafting speed, mining speed and reach all start off very short, increasing with armour upgrades. You move faster in lighter armor. Map is disabled without armour. Hotbar requires the toolbelt, and Steel Axe increases mining speed significantly. Burner assembler is included to allow early game automation.
